definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: talk indistinctly, unintelligibly (NH id., in deriv. ([[לַעַז]] foreign language, [[לָעוּז]] foreigner), also murmur, remonstrate; Syr. l9ez talk indistinctly; Ar. lagaza distort; IV. talk obscurely, ambiguously);—only

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pt. [[עַם לֽעֵז]] Ps 114:1 a people talking unintelligibly (‖[[מִחְרַיִם]]).
